scripts.build: esbuild index.ts --bundle --outfile=upleveled-drone.mjs --platform=node --target=node16.8 --format=esm --banner:js="import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire } from 'module'; import { dirname } from 'node:path'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'node:url'; const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename); const require = topLevelCreateRequire(import.meta.url);"
